roleset.name: coordinate
roleset.note: MESH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mesh' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from mesh.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: missing agent
example.text: But just how does Mr. Downey's unorthodox style mesh with the sedate tone of CNBC's business programming?
example.arg: with the sedate tone of CNBC 's business programming

example.name: with agent?
example.text: Mary meshed her plans for life after John's demise with those of her evil twin.
example.arg: her plans for life after John's demise
with those of her evil twin
